analysis.description:
PHICrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_contracts/0xf16d5b36d6a29832898c439bc596c6a01218dc59.sol#385-410) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 1
	- currentPeriod == 2

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0xf16d5b36d6a29832898c439bc596c6a01218dc59.sol#265-279) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0xf16d5b36d6a29832898c439bc596c6a01218dc59.sol#276)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf16d5b36d6a29832898c439bc596c6a01218dc59.sol#47-49)
